trans-unit.source: Accorder Paladin
trans-unit.target: 轮驻军神圣武士

trans-unit.resname: MBS·1 | Accorder Paladin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 战嚎 （每当此生物攻击时，每个进行攻击的其他生物各得+1/+0直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.source: "I fight for the suns, the surface, and everything in between."
trans-unit.target: 「我为了太阳，大地，以及之间的所有东西而战。」

trans-unit.source: Ardent Recruit
trans-unit.target: 热诚新兵

trans-unit.resname: MBS·2 | Ardent Recruit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Metalcraft — CARDNAME gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 金技～只要你操控三个或更多神器，CARDNAME便得+2/+2。

trans-unit.source: "We lost our homes and our kin. We won't let those rotters take our future as well."
trans-unit.target: 「我们失去了家园与亲人。 这些腐化者别想再夺走我们的未来。」

trans-unit.source: Banishment Decree
trans-unit.target: 逐令裁决

trans-unit.resname: MBS·3 | Banishment Decree | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器，生物，或结界置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: "Unworthy of consecration."\n—Axsh, lesser cenobite
trans-unit.target: 「没资格拿来奉献。」 ～初阶修道士哀格许

trans-unit.source: Choking Fumes
trans-unit.target: 窒息烟气

trans-unit.resname: MBS·4 | Choking Fumes | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put a -1/-1 counter on each attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: 在每个进行攻击的生物上各放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Fall to your knees and welcome our embrace."\n—Qal-Sha, Priest of Norn
trans-unit.target: 「屈膝迎接我们的拥抱。」 ～艾蕾侬僧侣刻沙

trans-unit.source: Divine Offering
trans-unit.target: 圣洁的献礼

trans-unit.resname: MBS·5 | Divine Offering | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器。 你获得等同于其总法术力费用的生命。

trans-unit.source: "The Phyrexians *are* vulnerable. Do not despair. We will prevail!"\n—Juryan, rebel leader
trans-unit.target: 「非瑞克西亚人并非不死身。 别沮丧； 我们终将胜利！」 ～叛军领袖哲扬

trans-unit.source: Frantic Salvage
trans-unit.target: 狂乱回收

trans-unit.resname: MBS·6 | Frantic Salvage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Put any number of target artifact cards from your graveyard on top of your library.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将任意数量的目标神器牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "We will mourn when there is time. For now, we survive."
trans-unit.target: 「该哀悼时，我们会哀悼。 目前，我们要活着。」

trans-unit.source: Gore Vassal
trans-unit.target: 血块下属

trans-unit.resname: MBS·7 | Gore Vassal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Then if that creature's toughness is 1 or greater, regenerate it.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：在目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。 然后如果该生物的防御力为1或更多，则重生之。

trans-unit.source: "Rid them of their unfaithful organs. Bring new hearts to the unbelievers."\n—*Tome of Machines*, verse 1703
trans-unit.target: 「拿掉他们不忠的器官。 让拒信者得到全新的心。」 ～《机械圣典》，第1703节

trans-unit.resname: MBS·8 | Hero of Bladehold | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hero of Bladehold
trans-unit.target: 锐锋城塞勇士

trans-unit.resname: MBS·8 | Hero of Bladehold | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, put two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.
trans-unit.target: 战嚎 （每当此生物攻击时，每个进行攻击的其他生物各得+1/+0直到回合结束。） 每当CARDNAME攻击时，将两个1/1白色士兵衍生生物横置放进战场且正进行攻击。

trans-unit.source: Kemba's Legion
trans-unit.target: 肯芭军团兵

trans-unit.resname: MBS·9 | Kemba's Legion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nCARDNAME can block an additional creature for each Equipment attached to CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 CARDNAME上每装备一个武具，便可以额外多阻挡一个生物。

trans-unit.source: The squabble over succession was quickly replaced by the struggle to survive.
trans-unit.target: 继任争执很快变成了生存挣扎。

trans-unit.source: Leonin Relic-Warder
trans-unit.target: 狮族遗宝护卫

trans-unit.resname: MBS·10 | Leonin Relic-Warder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile target artifact or enchantment.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以放逐目标神器或结界。 当CARDNAME离开战场时，将所放逐的牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Leonin Skyhunter
trans-unit.target: 狮族空猎者

trans-unit.resname: MBS·11 | Leonin Skyhunter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "The infection has spread farther than we could glimpse from the heights of Taj-Nar."
trans-unit.target: 「这感染蔓延太广，从塔吉纳的高处已经看不到边界。」

trans-unit.source: Loxodon Partisan
trans-unit.target: 象族游击队

trans-unit.resname: MBS·12 | Loxodon Partisan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 战嚎 （每当此生物攻击时，每个进行攻击的其他生物各得+1/+0直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.source: "This war is not about loxodon or leonin, Sylvok or Auriok. To defeat these rotters, we must do it together."
trans-unit.target: 「这场战争不只属于象族或狮族，希沃克或欧瑞克。 为了打败这些腐化者，我们必须团结一致。」

trans-unit.source: Master's Call
trans-unit.target: 主子呼唤

trans-unit.resname: MBS·13 | Master's Call | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put two 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 将两个1/1无色秘耳衍生神器生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: The need to obey was inscribed on every plate in their bodies.
trans-unit.target: 服从欲刻划在其体内每片骨板上。

trans-unit.source: Mirran Crusader
trans-unit.target: 秘罗圣战军

trans-unit.resname: MBS·14 | Mirran Crusader | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Double strike, protection from black and from green
trans-unit.target: 连击，反黑保护，反绿保护

trans-unit.source: A symbol of what Mirrodin once was and hope for what it will be again.
trans-unit.target: 这是秘罗地过去样貌的象征，也是它将恢复原貌的希望。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Rebirth
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚再生

trans-unit.resname: MBS·15 | Phyrexian Rebirth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures, then put an X/X colorless Horror artifact creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the number of creatures destroyed this way.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物，然后将一个X/X无色惊惧兽衍生神器生物放进战场，X为以此法消灭的生物数量。

trans-unit.source: As long as one drop of the oil exists, the joyous work continues.
trans-unit.target: 只要有这样的一滴油，愉悦的工作就会继续。

trans-unit.resname: MBS·16 | Priests of Norn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Priests of Norn
trans-unit.target: 艾蕾侬僧侣

trans-unit.resname: MBS·16 | Priests of Norn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nInfect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
trans-unit.target: 警戒 侵染 （此生物会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。）

trans-unit.resname: MBS·16 | Priests of Norn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "May our blessings sever the tongues of the forsaken."\n—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
trans-unit.target: 「愿我们的祝福截断遭弃者的舌头。」 ～大修道士艾蕾侬

trans-unit.source: Tine Shrike
trans-unit.target: 刺啄鸟

trans-unit.resname: MBS·17 | Tine Shrike | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nInfect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 侵染 （此生物会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: A new bird of prey—one that hunts sentience.
trans-unit.target: 新种的猎鸟～专门猎捕有感情者。

trans-unit.source: Victory's Herald
trans-unit.target: 胜利传令使

trans-unit.resname: MBS·18 | Victory's Herald | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, attacking creatures gain flying and lifelink until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，进行攻击的生物获得飞行与系命直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The corruption stirred the heavens above, awaking a shining champion.
trans-unit.target: 这场腐化惊动上天，唤醒闪耀的斗士。

trans-unit.resname: MBS·19 | White Sun's Zenith | Card Name
trans-unit.source: White Sun's Zenith
trans-unit.target: 白阳当空

trans-unit.resname: MBS·19 | White Sun's Zenith | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens onto the battlefield. Shuffle CARDNAME into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 将X个2/2白色猫衍生生物放进战场。 将CARDNAME洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: MBS·19 | White Sun's Zenith | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After the Battle of Liet Field, the white sun crested above Taj-Nar, bringing hope to all who survived the carnage.
trans-unit.target: 在列原之战结束后，白阳于塔吉纳上空登顶，替所有杀戮存活者带来希望。

trans-unit.resname: MBS·20 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blue Sun's Zenith
trans-unit.target: 蓝阳当空

trans-unit.resname: MBS·20 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle CARDNAME into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓X张牌。 将CARDNAME洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: MBS·20 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Origin Query will wait. We must ensure we survive to return to it."\n—Pelyus, vedalken ordinar
trans-unit.target: 「把原初疑问放一边。 我们得先活下来才能继续探讨。」 ～维多肯维律者佩留斯

trans-unit.source: Consecrated Sphinx
trans-unit.target: 祝圣史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: MBS·21 | Consecrated Sphinx | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever an opponent draws a card, you may draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，你可以抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: Blessed by the hands of Jin-Gitaxias.
trans-unit.target: 由金吉塔厦亲手祝福。

trans-unit.source: Corrupted Conscience
trans-unit.target: 感知染污

trans-unit.resname: MBS·22 | Corrupted Conscience | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nYou control enchanted creature.\nEnchanted creature has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 你操控所结附的生物。 所结附的生物具有侵染异能。 （它会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: Karn's creation is now his master.
trans-unit.target: 卡恩的造物已成了他的主宰。

trans-unit.source: Cryptoplasm
trans-unit.target: 隐密移型浆

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have CARDNAME become a copy of another target creature. If you do, CARDNAME gains this ability.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以使CARDNAME成为令一个目标生物的复制。 如果你如此作，则CARDNAME获得此异能。

trans-unit.source: "If left in the enemy's shape too long, it might be lost to them."\n—Vy Covalt, Neurok agent
trans-unit.target: 「如果让它维持敌人的外型太久，可能就留不住了。」 ～纽若克密探范科沃

trans-unit.source: Distant Memories
trans-unit.target: 遥远回忆

trans-unit.resname: MBS·24 | Distant Memories | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, exile it, then shuffle your library. Any opponent may have you put that card into your hand. If no player does, you draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，将其放逐，然后将你的牌库洗牌。 任一位对手可以令你将该牌置于你手上。 如果没有牌手如此选择，则你抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The fleeting shadows of his primitive self have all but vanished."\n—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
trans-unit.target: 「他初始自我的飞掠阴影已经完全消失。」 ～核心卜算师金吉塔厦

trans-unit.resname: MBS·25 | Fuel for the Cause | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fuel for the Cause
trans-unit.target: 大业驱力

trans-unit.resname: MBS·25 | Fuel for the Cause | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语，然后增殖。 （你选择任意数量其上有指示物的永久物和／或牌手，然后在其上放置一个它已有之类别的指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: MBS·25 | Fuel for the Cause | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your ideas will be discarded and your will repurposed."
trans-unit.target: 「你的意念将弃置不用，你的意志将重新规划。」

trans-unit.source: Mirran Spy
trans-unit.target: 秘罗间谍

trans-unit.resname: MBS·26 | Mirran Spy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you cast an artifact spell, you may untap target creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你施放一个神器咒语时，你可以重置目标生物。

trans-unit.source: Accurate information is a precious commodity in times of war.
trans-unit.target: 在战乱时代，明确资讯特别地珍贵。

trans-unit.source: Mitotic Manipulation
trans-unit.target: 操纵丝裂

trans-unit.resname: MBS·27 | Mitotic Manipulation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put one of those cards onto the battlefield if it has the same name as a permanent. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的七张牌。 如果任一张牌的名称与某个永久物相同，你可以将其中的一张同名牌放进战场。 将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.source: "They can't even comprehend nature. How could they improve it?"\n—Venser
trans-unit.target: 「他们连自然都不了解。 这样怎可能将它改进？」 ～凡瑟

trans-unit.source: Neurok Commando
trans-unit.target: 纽若克突击兵

trans-unit.resname: MBS·28 | Neurok Commando | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Shroud\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 帷幕 每当CARDNAME对一位牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "There's no more time for secluded study. Answers are there only for those with the courage to take them."
trans-unit.target: 「已经没时间关上门研究了。 唯有勇敢寻求的人才能得到解答。」

trans-unit.source: Oculus
trans-unit.target: 眼球妖

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从战场进入坟墓场时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "In its gaze I saw no mercy, no recognition that I was worthy to exist."\n—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent
trans-unit.target: 「它无情地盯着我，好像我并不值得存在。」 ～纽若克密探凯拉黎

trans-unit.source: Quicksilver Geyser
trans-unit.target: 水银海涌泉

trans-unit.resname: MBS·30 | Quicksilver Geyser | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return up to two target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将至多两个非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "Phyrexians are tenacious. That's not the same thing as clever."\n—Tezzeret
trans-unit.target: 「非瑞克西亚人很顽强。 这与聪明是两回事。」 ～泰兹瑞

trans-unit.source: Serum Raker
trans-unit.target: 浆液纵掠者

trans-unit.resname: MBS·31 | Serum Raker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each player discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME从战场进入坟墓场时，每位牌手各弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The serum from the blinkmoths they gather greases the joints of witch engines.
trans-unit.target: 他们聚集光蛾、采集浆液，用来润滑其邪法机械的关节。

trans-unit.source: Spire Serpent
trans-unit.target: 尖塔巨蛇

trans-unit.resname: MBS·32 | Spire Serpent | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\nMetalcraft — As long as you control three or more artifacts, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and can attack as though it didn't have defender.
trans-unit.target: 守军 金技～只要你操控三个或更多神器，CARDNAME便得+2/+2且能视同不具守军异能地进行攻击。

trans-unit.source: A mirror to draw its eye, a rod to rouse its rage, and a sword to break its bonds.
trans-unit.target: 拿镜子引其注意，用棍子激其怒意，以利剑断其连结。

trans-unit.source: Steel Sabotage
trans-unit.target: 捣毁钢铁

trans-unit.resname: MBS·33 | Steel Sabotage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one — Counter target artifact spell; or return target artifact to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～反击目标神器咒语；或将目标神器移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "You are hopelessly obsolete, my brothers. Come and join the Great Work."\n—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur
trans-unit.target: 「兄弟啊，你完全脱节了。 加入伟大志业的行列吧。」 ～卜算手信众卢米

trans-unit.source: Treasure Mage
trans-unit.target: 宝物法师

trans-unit.resname: MBS·34 | Treasure Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用大于或等于6的神器牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。 如果你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: MBS·35 | Turn the Tide | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Turn the Tide
trans-unit.target: 扭转局势

trans-unit.resname: MBS·35 | Turn the Tide | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MBS·35 | Turn the Tide | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Let their mindless armies come and face the might of genius."\n—Varil, Neurok partisan
trans-unit.target: 「教他们没有心智的部队放马过来，尝尝智者的厉害。」 ～纽若克游击队员帆利

trans-unit.source: Vedalken Anatomist
trans-unit.target: 维多肯解剖学家

trans-unit.resname: MBS·36 | Vedalken Anatomist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. You may tap or untap that creature.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}：在目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。 你可以横置或重置该生物。

trans-unit.source: "Specimen 211 examination report. Observation: graft sublimation incomplete. Result: death. Prepare specimen 212."
trans-unit.target: 「样本211检视报告。 观察：移植物纯化未完成。 结果：死亡。 准备样本212。」

trans-unit.source: Vedalken Infuser
trans-unit.target: 维多肯灌输师

trans-unit.resname: MBS·37 | Vedalken Infuser | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以在目标神器上放置一个充电指示物。

trans-unit.source: "All plans begin as dreams. I intend to awaken them."
trans-unit.target: 「所有计划刚开始都是梦想。 而我要将它们唤醒。」

trans-unit.source: Vivisection
trans-unit.target: 活体解剖

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.\nDraw three cards.

Myr Sire
trans-unit.target: 秘耳君父

trans-unit.resname: MBS·116 | Myr Sire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从战场进入坟墓场时，将一个1/1无色秘耳衍生神器生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: For the Phyrexians, death is not an end, nor a one-time occurrence.
trans-unit.target: 对非瑞克西亚人来说，死亡既非终点，亦非仅只一次的事件。

trans-unit.source: Myr Turbine
trans-unit.target: 秘耳涡轮机

trans-unit.resname: MBS·117 | Myr Turbine | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.\n{T}, Tap five untapped Myr you control: Search your library for a Myr creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：将一个1/1无色秘耳衍生神器生物放进战场。 {T}，横置五个由你操控、且未横置的秘耳：从你的牌库中搜寻一张秘耳生物牌，将它放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Myr Welder
trans-unit.target: 秘耳焊工

trans-unit.resname: MBS·118 | Myr Welder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Imprint — {T}: Exile target artifact card from a graveyard.\nCARDNAME has all activated abilities of all cards exiled with it.
trans-unit.target: 压印～{T}：将目标神器牌从坟墓场放逐。 CARDNAME具有所有被它放逐之牌的所有起动式异能。

trans-unit.source: Memnarch designed some myr to follow the levelers and reaffix lost parts. Mirran partisans put that instinct to good use.
trans-unit.target: 蒙纳坷设计了某些秘耳，用来跟随夷平者、将松脱的零件装回去。 秘罗游击队善加利用了这本能。

trans-unit.source: Peace Strider
trans-unit.target: 和平神行客

trans-unit.resname: MBS·119 | Peace Strider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The Vanished must have sent it from beyond to aid us in this struggle."\n—Kessla, Sylvok shaman
trans-unit.target: 「这必定是消失的一代从彼方送来，好助我们渡过此劫。」 ～希沃克祭师凯丝拉

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Digester
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚消化者

trans-unit.resname: MBS·120 | Phyrexian Digester | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
trans-unit.target: 侵染 （此生物会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: "Our cause will ripen in the fertile flesh of the unworthy."\n—Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 「丰富的鄙陋者肉身，将促成我们的大业。」 ～细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Juggernaut
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚攻城巨车

trans-unit.resname: MBS·121 | Phyrexian Juggernaut | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)\nCARDNAME attacks each turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 侵染 （此生物会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。） CARDNAME每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.source: Where nature impedes, Phyrexians overcome.
trans-unit.target: 当大自然出手妨碍，非瑞克西亚人总能克服。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Revoker
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚断念妖

trans-unit.resname: MBS·122 | Phyrexian Revoker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, name a nonland card.\nActivated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，说出一个非地牌的名称。 具有该名称之来源的起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.source: Basic senses like sight and taste are reserved for those in power.
trans-unit.target: 视力与味觉这种基本感知能力只会留给掌权者。

trans-unit.source: Pierce Strider
trans-unit.target: 穿刺神行客

trans-unit.resname: MBS·123 | Pierce Strider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手失去3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Pain isn't a negative stimulus. Pain is a sign of your imperfection."\n—Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 「痛苦并非负面的刺激。 痛苦是你未臻完美的讯号。」 ～细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.source: Piston Sledge
trans-unit.target: 活塞锤

trans-unit.resname: MBS·124 | Piston Sledge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +3/+1.
Equip—
Sacrifice an artifact.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将它装备在目标由你操控的生物上。 佩带此武具的生物得+3/+1。 佩带～牺牲一个神器。

trans-unit.source: Only the goblins could make a simple machine so complex.
trans-unit.target: 只有鬼怪能把简单的机械弄得如此复杂。

trans-unit.source: Plague Myr
trans-unit.target: 疫病秘耳

trans-unit.resname: MBS·125 | Plague Myr | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)\n{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 侵染 （此生物会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。） {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: They watch for a new master, one more sinister than the last.
trans-unit.target: 他们寻求着新主子：比前一任更加邪恶的主子。

trans-unit.source: Psychosis Crawler
trans-unit.target: 变态爬虫

trans-unit.resname: MBS·126 | Psychosis Crawler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.\nWhenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于你的手牌数量。 每当你抓一张牌时，每位对手各失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "If that brain can't figure out the secret of the serum, then add more brains."\n—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur
trans-unit.target: 「如果那脑子无法理解浆液的秘密，就多加几个脑子。」 ～卜算手信众卢米

trans-unit.source: Razorfield Rhino
trans-unit.target: 锐草原犀牛

trans-unit.resname: MBS·127 | Razorfield Rhino | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Metalcraft — CARDNAME gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 金技～只要你操控三个或更多神器，CARDNAME便得+2/+2。

trans-unit.source: Adapted to tread on razorgrass, the rhino proved adept at treading on Phyrexians as well.
trans-unit.target: 这犀牛已习于踩踏锐草，而踩踏非瑞克西亚人更是得心应手。

trans-unit.source: Rusted Slasher
trans-unit.target: 锈斑斩击兽

trans-unit.resname: MBS·128 | Rusted Slasher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice an artifact: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "It's a beautiful vision. Discarded debris is reborn as a singular entity."\n—Urabrask the Hidden
trans-unit.target: 「这景象真美妙。 遭弃残骸以完整实体再生。」 ～隐匿者洼巴司

trans-unit.source: Shimmer Myr
trans-unit.target: 烁光秘耳

trans-unit.resname: MBS·129 | Shimmer Myr | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nYou may cast artifact cards as though they had flash.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 你可以将神器牌视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.source: It evades Phyrexians by hiding in the spaces between seconds.
trans-unit.target: 它遁入秒与秒的间隙，好避开非瑞克西亚人。

trans-unit.source: Shriekhorn
trans-unit.target: 悲鸣号角

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it.\n{T}, Remove a charge counter from CARDNAME: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有三个充电指示物。 {T}，从CARDNAME上移去一个充电指示物：目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Signal Pest
trans-unit.target: 信号害虫

trans-unit.resname: MBS·131 | Signal Pest | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)\nCARDNAME can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
trans-unit.target: 战嚎 （每当此生物攻击时，每个进行攻击的其他生物各得+1/+0直到回合结束。） 只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: It leaps from tree to tree, revealing the enemy's positions.
trans-unit.target: 它在树间跳跃，显示出敌人的位置。

trans-unit.source: Silverskin Armor
trans-unit.target: 银肌甲

trans-unit.resname: MBS·132 | Silverskin Armor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and is an artifact in addition to its other types.\nEquip {2}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+1/+1且额外具有神器此类别。 佩带{2}

trans-unit.source: Partisan spies warned that no armor would protect the body from Phyrexian infection. Neurok strategists took that as a challenge.
trans-unit.target: 游击队探子警告道：任何铠甲都无法让身体抵挡非瑞克西亚的感染。 纽若克策士则将此当成挑战。

trans-unit.source: Skinwing
trans-unit.target: 皮翼装

trans-unit.source: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)\nEquipped creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.\nEquip {6}

trans-unit.resname: MBS·134 | Sphere of the Suns | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sphere of the Suns
trans-unit.target: 五阳法球

trans-unit.resname: MBS·134 | Sphere of the Suns | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped and with three charge counters on it.\n{T}, Remove a charge counter from CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场且上面有三个充电指示物。 {T}，从CARDNAME上移去一个充电指示物：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Spin Engine
trans-unit.target: 旋转引擎

trans-unit.resname: MBS·135 | Spin Engine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}: Target creature can't block CARDNAME this turn.
trans-unit.target: {R}：目标生物本回合中不能阻挡CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "It will be battle-ready before our strike at Oxid Ridge, and it will guarantee our victory."\n—Ketuc of the Helm
trans-unit.target: 「在我们攻打奥悉达山脊之前，它将能派上战场，并保证我方的胜利。」 ～盔族的凯图

trans-unit.resname: MBS·136 | Spine of Ish Sah | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spine of Ish Sah
trans-unit.target: 伊沙脊柱

trans-unit.resname: MBS·136 | Spine of Ish Sah | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent.\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭目标永久物。 当CARDNAME从战场进入坟墓场时，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.source: Strandwalker
trans-unit.target: 行缕装

trans-unit.source: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)\nEquipped creature gets +2/+4 and has reach.\nEquip {4}

trans-unit.resname: MBS·138 | Sword of Feast and Famine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sword of Feast and Famine
trans-unit.target: 丰馑剑

trans-unit.resname: MBS·138 | Sword of Feast and Famine | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from black and from green.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you untap all lands you control.\nEquip {2}
Tangle Hulk
trans-unit.target: 铬铜林巨汉

trans-unit.resname: MBS·139 | Tangle Hulk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{G}: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G}：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "A true Phyrexian predator. It will never know death, just as nature intended."\n—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
trans-unit.target: 「真正的非瑞克西亚掠食者。 它将永不知死亡的滋味，一如大自然所愿。」 ～饥饿之声弗霖凯

trans-unit.source: Thopter Assembly
trans-unit.target: 组装振翼机

trans-unit.resname: MBS·140 | Thopter Assembly | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no Thopters other than CARDNAME, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand and put five 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 在你的维持开始时，若你并未操控CARDNAME以外的振翼机，则将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上，并将五个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Titan Forge
trans-unit.target: 泰坦锻冶炉

trans-unit.resname: MBS·141 | Titan Forge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\n{T}, Remove three charge counters from CARDNAME: Put a 9/9 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 {T}，从CARDNAME上移去三个充电指示物：将一个9/9无色魔像衍生神器生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Training Drone
trans-unit.target: 受训奴兽

trans-unit.resname: MBS·142 | Training Drone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't attack or block unless it's equipped.
trans-unit.target: 除非CARDNAME佩带武具，否则它不能进行攻击或阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Vulshok flail, Viridian shield, loxodon blade . . . Tazzir, bring the Moriok hook and assemble the rookies."\n—Vy Covalt, Neurok agent
trans-unit.target: 「瓦许克的连枷，暗碧族的盾，象族的剑...塔季，把莫锐可的钩子装到新兵上。」 ～纽若克密探范科沃

trans-unit.source: Viridian Claw
trans-unit.target: 暗碧族利爪

trans-unit.resname: MBS·143 | Viridian Claw | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.\nEquip {1}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+1/+0并具有先攻异能。 佩带{1}

trans-unit.source: "Phyrexians can't corrupt what they can't get close enough to touch."
trans-unit.target: 「非瑞克西亚人无法腐化那些他们不能靠近接触的东西。」

trans-unit.resname: MBS·144 | Contested War Zone | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Contested War Zone
trans-unit.target: 争斗战区

trans-unit.resname: MBS·144 | Contested War Zone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, that creature's controller gains control of CARDNAME.\n{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物对你造成战斗伤害时，该生物的操控者获得CARDNAME之操控权。 {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}，{T}：进行攻击的生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Inkmoth Nexus
trans-unit.target: 墨蛾连结点

trans-unit.resname: MBS·145 | Inkmoth Nexus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}: CARDNAME becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying and infect until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}：CARDNAME成为1/1，具飞行与侵染异能的光蛾神器生物直到回合结束。 它仍然是地。 （它会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。）
